name: Drone Eats
description:
Can you become a millionaire?

Try to get as rich as possible by providing a food service that no one has ever done, drones pick up the food and they deliver it. Code your drones with the arrows keys and then press enter, see them fly why you patiently wait, but be careful, birds can destroy your drones and they also can get out of battery, don't forget to recharge in the building.
